sentences.sContent: One arrangement now under strain is the 1960 Indus Waters Treaty between India and Pakistan.
sentences.sContent_eng: One arrangement now under strain is the 1960 Indus Waters Treaty between India and Pakistan.
sentences.sCn: 目前处境紧张的一项协议是1960年印度和巴基斯坦签订的印度河水域条约。

sentences.sContent: Theremains of the Indus valley civilisation cover an area of Pakistan andnorth-west India about a quarter the size of Europe.
sentences.sContent_eng: Theremains of the Indus valley civilisation cover an area of Pakistan andnorth-west India about a quarter the size of Europe.
sentences.sCn: 印度河流域文明的遗址包括今天的巴基斯坦和西北部地区，大约是欧洲面积的四分之一。

sentences.sContent: Those cattle are both assets and income generators for Pakistani villagers along the Indus River.
sentences.sContent_eng: Those cattle are both assets and income generators for Pakistani villagers along the Indus River.
sentences.sCn: 那些牛群是这些印度河沿岸巴基斯坦村民的财产和收入来源。

trans.tranCn: 印度河（印度西北部的河流）
